greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A341615: a(n) = 1 if sigma(n) < 2n < A003961(n), otherwise 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: f[1] = 1; f[n_] := Times @@ (NextPrime[#1]^#2 & @@@ FactorInteger[n]); a[n_] := Boole[DivisorSigma[1, n] < 2*n < f[n]]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Feb 22 2021 *)
program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 22 2021
